TopicTitle: any tool for to check which mods are you using on a vessel ?

Articles.Content: Hello guys, is there any tool for to check which mods are you using on a vessel ? I think I’m overload of mods and that’ means many parts...and I ‘m not sure if I need or I’m using all of them, maybe there is some that I can get rid off so my computer can have a bit of relief..

Try the Janitor's Closet mod, I believe that tells you what mod each part came from in the editors. Not hugely helpful if you've already deleted the craft files for active vessels but could do what you need it to do.

On 10/1/2021 at 12:16 PM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Try the Janitor's Closet mod, I believe that tells you what mod each part came from in the editors. Not hugely helpful if you've already deleted the craft files for active vessels but could do what you need it to do.

It seems that mod is the closest to what I want, at first look, the idea of to prune stuff seems scary, but I can just hide the parts that I´m not using it, and that´s good enough, thanks!

Edited October 3, 2021 by Makrom
